answers.answer: Yes, the two things are not related. If you are experiencing symptoms of diabetes you should have a test. Untreated Type 1 diabetes can be very dangerous.

question: I have been experiencing many of the symptoms of diabetes, but I am allso on an antidepressant that cause weight gain.  If I miss a day, I loose wieght, but if I take it then I gain weight.  I have also been experiencing diabetes symptoms before the medication. Could you still have diabetes, even if you experience wieght gain for an antidepressant?
title: Weight gian and weight loss????
